title: Silent Hill 4 The Room XBOX NTSC
description:
Published by:                      Konami
Developed by:                    Konami TYO
Region:                               NTSC
Genre:                                 Third-Person Adventure
Number of Players:             1
Release Date:                     September 8, 2004
ESRB Content Descriptors: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes

Henry Townshend finds himself trapped in his own cursed apartment. Only by exploring mysterious portals leading to disturbing alternate worlds will Henry begin to uncover clues as to why he is trapped. Such is the premise of Silent Hill 4 The Room, a more action-focused entry into Konami&#039;s survival horror series. Features include a higher number of weapons and enemies than previous games in the series, changes to the environment in real time, shifts between the first- and third-person perspective, and various visual and control upgrades to the Silent Hill 3 engine. Levels include a forest, a prison and a hotel
